name: Mutthi Kabab Recipe | Shireen Anwar | Masala TV
ingredients: Ingredients for Mutthi Kabab Recipe: Mince half kg Onions (grated) 2 Ginger garlic paste 1 tsp Coriander leave 1 tsp Green chilies 2- 3 Turmeric half tsp Garam Masala 1 tsp Sambal Oelek 1 tbsp Crushed Red Pepper 1 tsp Oil 1 Â½ tbsp Salt 1 tsp Oil for shallow frying
instructions: Mix all the ingredients in a bowl knead well make sausage shape kababs, heat fry pan put the kababs on it cook on high heat for 5 min reduce heat and cook kabab for another 5 min serve with tamarind chatni and onion rings.
